SamIntro: ^You're not an econ major are you?

g-0: ^You know what's so BS about econ? A whole field of study based around the premise that people will act rationally. Me, I know people. We aren't rational.

c-2: ^Scared shitless. I'm Sam by the way.

Alexsfriend: ^You're Alex's friend, right? I must commend you on your return to dear old Smithfield.

c-0: ^That was genuinely meant, I swear. Happy to see someone else with the endurance to withstand the bullshit.

brownnoser: ^Ha. I'm sure. How else would we move survive in this world of effete brown-nosers?
cheery: ^I'm a fucking delight. And Econ is still bullshit.
comiserate: ^I mean, the brown-nosers are harmless enough, if you stay out of their way. The posers on the otherhand, out of control.

g-0: ^Riley for one, the host... What do you think of her?

c-2: ^I'll let you form your own oppinion then. Just keep your guard up when you meet her.
c-4: ^Precisely. The worst is that everyone is absolutely charmed by her antics. Scared shitless, I'm telling you.

SamEcon: ^Unfortunately, I do in fact have that pleasure.

c-0: ^I try not to. But, I assure you, I have nothing but the most righteous of end goals. Take em down from the inside and all that.
c-1: ^Technically, I didn't. But dad pays for this outrageous tuition, so... here I am.

guess: ^What about you, what are you studying? Wait, let me guess. Definitely liberal arts, no one back home is stressing about their future. Hmm... comp lit?

c-0: ^It's written all over your face. "I'm just here to read books and have stimulating discussions." You lucky bastard.
c-1: ^Oh don't tell me you're premed too. It's what my sister's doing, and she's won't shut up about it.
c-2: ^Aha, a.k.a. anthropology of the European urban poor.
c-3: ^I spoke too soon. You're clearly meant to be your parents' retirement plan.

semesterEnd: ^How's the end of the semester looking for you? Finals stressing you out?

SamDrugs: ^It's ok to act from a place of fear, worry, anxiety, whatever you want to call it. It's what actually makes the world go round. All those stuck up dipshits in the Econ department are deluding themselves.

c-0: ^They're all just symptoms you can treat. Say what you will, those premed losers on the otherhand are actually onto something.

contact: ^Stress, lack of focus, loosing sleep, they all have an easy fix. If you ever find yourself needing an easy fix, text me.

c-0: ^Sure yeah. A massage in an unmarked plastic baggy.

c-2: ^< Sam takes your profered phone and saves a number as "The Econ Major." >
c-3: ^Suit yourself. If you change your mind, just ask Riley you need help with Econ homework. She'll put you in touch.

SamDefault: ^< Sam just raises and eyebrow. You're unsure if it's an acknowledgement or a dismissal. >
